participant_1.background:
I like to wear comfortable clothes that allow me to move around and express myself.
i am currently going to school to be an artist.
My family members all have different jobs, but we all share a love for animals.
I am a loner and my family are my only friends.
I don't care about my height because I am comfortable with who I am.

participant_2.background:
I am not comfortable talking about my parents' death.
my family loves me , but keeps their distance.
I'm not sure if my parents would approve of my dream to go to Mars.
i think the moon landing was faked.
My family is close-knit and we enjoy spending time together, especially on sunny days.

content.text: Hey there! Not much, how about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!  What are your hobbies?
I like to draw, paint, and play video games.
Oh that's really cool! I like to draw and paint too.  What kind of video games do you like?
I like all kinds of video games, but I'm really into open world RPGs right now.
Me too! I love exploring and finding new things in open world games.  Have you heard of the new game, Elden Ring?
Yes, I have! I'm really excited to play it.  Have you played it yet?
Not yet, but I'm planning on getting it soon.  It looks like it's going to be a lot of fun.
I'm sure it will be!  I've heard great things about it.  Do you have any other hobbies?
Yeah, I like to go hiking and camping with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun!  I've never been camping before, but I've always wanted to try it.
You should!  It's a great way to get out in nature and enjoy the outdoors.
I'll have to give it a try sometime.  Thanks for the recommendation!
